root: ^Well, the area is cleared. It seems the jellyfish also left as well.
^Looks liked they were caught in the debris of trash and ended up floating down here.
^But with nothing tethering him, they kinda just flew up away.
^[And still no sign of anything valuable…]
^Hi there fan, amazing work on the jellyfish and trash situation. The Great Barrier Reef looks a lot prettier now.
^You can call me Dross if you want… It’s my name.
^Well Dross, for all your hard work for making my next concert possible, name one thing you want and I’ll see if I can grant it for you.
^Oh wait, I never had a producer
^[No producer to manage her career? How did she make it this far in the industry?]
^[I could take advantage and ask for a VIP ticket to her next showing, or…]
^Well, that aside, you wouldn’t know of any place that has any treasure would you.
^I came to Great Barrier Reef looking for such a thing.
^Well, this might sound pretty cliché, but there are some ruins nearby. I’ve heard of legends of treasure in those types of places.
^[It is indeed pretty cliché, but I am at my wits end on this quest here]
^And good luck on your next concert, I’m looking forward to your next single.
^Sera, the starfish. The star that will brighten up the ocean with love and smiles.
^Oh, I know, I’ll dedicate my next song to the heroic hermit crab for the Great Barrier Reef!
